text.v: Cập nhật thông tin nhân viên nghỉ, vắng mặt

processing.text:
declare @q nvarchar(4000), @key nvarchar(4000), @field varchar(32) declare @user int, @admin bit, @sys varchar(32), @joinUnit bit, @joinDept bit, @r int, @count int
select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @sys = '@@sysDatabaseName', @key = '', @joinUnit = 0, @joinDept = 0
-- Checking &Checking;
select @field = 'ngay_tu' if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select @field, stt, '00002' from @@table where ngay_den < ngay_tu &w1;@field&w2;stt&w3;'00002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table where ngay_den < ngay_tu&Error; end if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select @field, a.stt, '00002' from @@table a join @@table b on a.ma_nv = b.ma_nv and a.loai_nghi = b.loai_nghi and ((a.ngay_tu <= b.ngay_den and a.ngay_den >= b.ngay_tu) or (b.ngay_tu <= a.ngay_tu and b.ngay_den >= a.ngay_den)) and a.stt <> b.stt where 1=1&w1;@field&w2;a.stt&w3;'00002'&w4; group by a.stt &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(a.stt) from @@table a join @@table b on a.ma_nv = b.ma_nv and a.loai_nghi = b.loai_nghi and ((a.ngay_tu <= b.ngay_den and a.ngay_den >= b.ngay_tu) or (b.ngay_tu <= a.ngay_tu and b.ngay_den >= a.ngay_den)) and a.stt <> b.stt &Error; end if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select @field, a.stt, '00002' from @@table a join hrnv c on a.ma_nv = c.ma_nv join hrnghi b on c.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.loai_nghi = b.loai_nghi and a.ngay_tu <> b.ngay_tu and ((a.ngay_tu <= b.ngay_den and a.ngay_den >= b.ngay_tu) or (b.ngay_tu <= a.ngay_tu and b.ngay_den >= a.ngay_den)) where 1=1&w1;@field&w2;a.stt&w3;'00002'&w4; group by a.stt &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(a.stt) from @@table a join hrnv c on a.ma_nv = c.ma_nv join hrnghi b on c.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.loai_nghi = b.loai_nghi and a.ngay_tu <> b.ngay_tu and ((a.ngay_tu <= b.ngay_den and a.ngay_den >= b.ngay_tu) or (b.ngay_tu <= a.ngay_tu and b.ngay_den >= a.ngay_den)) &Error; end &EndErrorMode;
-- Key if @admin = 0 begin exec AI_ERP$HRM$DeptRightFilter @user, @admin, 'e', 'e', @sys, @key output, @joinUnit output, @joinDept output
if @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@admin, @user, 'hrEmployeeLeaveInput', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = 0 end
select @key = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$GetCheckKey(@key) select @key = case when @key = '' then '' else ' where (' + @key + ')' end end
-- Gather select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_tu, ngay_den, loai_nghi, ma_ca, ma_cong, so_gio, muc_do, ghi_chu, cast(0 as int) as stt into #r from hrnghi
select @q = 'insert into #r select e.stt_rec, a.ngay_tu, a.ngay_den, a.loai_nghi, a.ma_ca, a.ma_cong, a.so_gio, a.muc_do, a.ghi_chu, 0' select @q = @q + ' from @@table a join hrnv e on a.ma_nv = e.ma_nv' + @key exec sp_executesql @q
-- Delete if @type = '0' delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from hrnghi b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.loai_nghi = b.loai_nghi and a.ngay_tu = b.ngay_tu) select b.stt_rec, a.ngay_tu, a.ngay_den, a.loai_nghi, a.ma_ca, a.ma_cong, a.so_gio, a.muc_do, a.ghi_chu into #k from #r a join hrnghi b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.loai_nghi = b.loai_nghi and a.ngay_tu = b.ngay_tu delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.loai_nghi = b.loai_nghi and a.ngay_tu = b.ngay_tu)
-- Insert select @count = count(*) from #r if @count > 0 begin -- Insert &Inserting; end -- Update if @type = '1' begin update hrnghi set @@list from hrnghi a join #k b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.loai_nghi = b.loai_nghi and a.ngay_tu = b.ngay_tu end
